TopicTitle: Independent Throttle? or Thrust Limiter Groups?

Articles.Content:
Is there a plugin that does this so far? Haven't seen anything in the forums yet.

I can set thrust limits and the applies according to symmetry; but only works in Editor. After launch engines has to be adjusted indivudally.

I see it working similar to Action Groups for engines; Thrust limits are linked for engines in the same group; and groups can be throttled independently. onscreen window with sliders to control throttle groups.

Shift/Ctrl would throttle everything by the same factor

e.g. throttle group 1 is at 50%; throttle group 2 is at 25%;

main throttle is at 75%.

final throttle for group 1 is 0.5*0.75 = 0.375

final throttle for group 2 is 0.25*0.75 = 0.1875

Z/X would set everything to 100% or 0% globally.

would be very useful for VTOL crafts.

Edited October 20, 2014 by nli2work

Don't know if they work in .25 or not but you might look at this. http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220667-throttle-controlled-avionics-1-4 or http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220590-davon-throttle-control-systems
